bdglue2.encoder

Class EventHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdglue2.encoder.EventHeader

  • public class EventHeader
extends Object
    A class for manageing the event header / meta information. Note that this class does not itself travel along with encoded data. Only the eventHeader HashMap.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventHeader

        public EventHeader()

    • Method Detail

      • putHeaderData

        public void putHeaderData(String key,
                          String value)
        This is header data that will travel along with the encoded record for downstream processing. For example, "Table" will be used to help with the multiplexing for each channel.
        Parameters:
        key - String that specifies the name/key
        value - String containing the value to be associated with the key

      • putColumnFamily

        public void putColumnFamily(String value)
        Set the column family in the event header.
        Parameters:
        value - name of the hbase column family for this record

      • putTable

        public void putTable(String value)
        Set the table name in the Avro event header.
        Parameters:
        value - the table name

      • putShortName

        public void putShortName(String value)
        Set the simple table name (i.e. without the schema name in the event header.
        Parameters:
        value - the simple table name

      • putOpType

        public void putOpType(String value)
        Set the operation type in the event header.
        Parameters:
        value - the operation type

      • putTimeStamp

        public void putTimeStamp(String value)
        Put the transaction timestamp in the Avro event header.
        Parameters:
        value - the timestamp

      • putRowKey

        public void putRowKey(String value)
        Put the key value for the row in the Avro event header.
        Parameters:
        value - the key to associate with the record on the target

      • putSchemaURL

        public void putSchemaURL(String value)
        Put the URL to the Avro schema file in HDFS in the Avro event header.
        Parameters:
        value - the URL/URI

      • getEventHeader

        public HashMap<String,String> getEventHeader()
        Returns:
        a Map containing the header key/value pairs for inclusion with the encoded record.

      • setHeaderInfo

        public void setHeaderInfo(DownstreamOperation op)
        Set the Avro event header information for this operation based on the encoder and target types, etc. Note that each call allocates a new eventHeader HashMap that will be passed along downstream to the publisher.
        Parameters:
        op - the current database operation.
